name: Ghost Hunter (iSaif)
description:
U have a gun and kill all ghost and get points ( like zombie games )

(EARLY ACCESS )

controls 

Move W A S  D 

jump Space

R realod ammo

C Dash (Can kill ghost too ) 

shoot left mouse button

ESCAPE AND P  Pause / un pause 

Install instructions

1. Download the game file    

2. Unzip the files (Winrar is recommended)
